articles.author: Christian Shepherd
articles.title: China expands military drills, escalates threats against Taiwan
articles.description: China announced additional live-fire drills in the Bohai and Yellow Seas, as Beijing broadcasts its fury over a visit to Taiwan by House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.

articles.author: Andrew Duehren and Siobhan Hughes
articles.title: Senate Democrats Close In on Passing Climate and Tax Bill
articles.description: After clearing a procedural hurdle in the narrowly divided chamber Saturday, Democrats are poised to pass the legislation on Sunday.
articles.content: After clearing a procedural hurdle in the narrowly divided chamber Saturday, Democrats are poised to pass the legislation on Sunday.

articles.title: Cincinnati bar shooting leaves at least 9 people injured: police
articles.description: At least people were injured outside a bar in Cincinnati around 1:45 a.m. Sunday morning but none of them are in critical condition. No suspects have been arrested.
articles.content:
A mass shooting in Cincinnati, Ohio early Sunday morning has left at least nine people injured, according to police.

articles.title: Israeli Airstrikes Hit Gaza for 2nd Day; Militants Respond With Rockets
articles.description: No cease-fire appeared imminent, despite early mediation efforts by international actors, including the United Nations. The death toll from the fighting grew to at least 24, Palestinian health authorities said.

articles.title: Flooding in Death Valley strands drivers, hotel guests
articles.description: Around 1,000 got trapped inside Death Valley National Park this weekend after a monsoonal storm drenched the area with rain.

articles.title: Coast Guard intercepts vessel carrying dozens of migrants off Key Largo
articles.description: The US Coast Guard intercepted a large vessel carrying dozens of migrants Saturday off Key Largo.
